TopicTitle: Anybody looking to join a Mount and Blade regiment?

Articles.Content: I'm recruiting for the 4th Prince of Wales' Own Volunteers. If you're interested, PM me!
What are they? Can we have more of a,description?

Sure!

Have you played Mount and Blade: Napoleonic Wars in MP?

The "battles" there end up as a kind of free-for-all.

By joining a regiment, you get to fight in the style of the Napoleonic Wars: Lines, Squares, Volleys, etc.

Most regiments have a schedule to fight; for instance, mine fights in a Siege battle on Sundays (7-9 PM EST), and Line Battles on Tuesdays and Fridays (same bat-time, same bat-channel!). The records in wins and losses are recorded and entered to a "league." At the end of a season, the best regiment wins!

The requirements for most regiments are: Have Mount and Blade4 Warband; Mount and Blade Warband: Napoleonic Wars, and have TeamSpeak 3 or better.

That answer your question?
